Articles.Content:
KSP Version: 1.3.0

What Happens: The game will throw a KSP_x64.exe has stopped working error.

Mods / Add-Ons: None

Steps to Replicate: Double click the Launch icon

Result: Game will try to load but ultimately fails within the loading phase.

Fixes/Workarounds: None that I am aware of.

Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files: Loads okay after a fresh install but crashes after that. I tried loading mods at first and experienced this error. I eventually went vanilla with 1.3.1 and found the same problem. I then went to 1.3.0 since it was supposedly more stable and same experience. 32 bit is slightly more stable but will crash eventually.

Edit: Formatted the links so that they're clickable

Part one , Part two ,  Specs
When KSP crashes and generates a folder with a timestamp name, it generates 3 files, output_log.txt (which you posted), error.log and crash.dmp . Could you also let us see your error.log file?
I just scoured all of the data folders in the main KSP folder and couldn't find any Error.log file or Crash.dmp. Only the Output_log.txt was available.

I am having a similar issue. On a fresh version of KSP 1.3.1, if I run KSP through steam and select the x64 option in the steam popup it will load x64 properly, but if I try to launch KSP_x64.exe directly it will crash before even opening the game window. It does not make an error file with the crash logs.
For what it is worth the x64.exe is crashing on a brand new install of 1.4.0. Is there anything on my side that could be causing this?
It seems I have the same problem as you two, no mods and only an output.log is produced. It is worth noting that this is still occurring in 1.4.1 with no mods installed.
bit hard with very limited information....
I added more information on the other post
